member.name: M:AnalysisManagerDtaSplitPlugIn.clsAnalysisResourcesDtaSplit.GetResources
member.summary: Retrieves files necessary for performance of Sequest analysis

member.name: M:AnalysisManagerDtaSplitPlugIn.clsAnalysisToolRunnerDtaSplit.Setup(AnalysisManagerBase.IMgrParams,AnalysisManagerBase.IJobParams,AnalysisManagerBase.IStatusFile)
member.param: Object for updating status file as job progresses

member.name: M:AnalysisManagerDtaSplitPlugIn.clsAnalysisToolRunnerDtaSplit.RunTool
member.returns: CloseOutType enum indicating success or failure

member.name: M:AnalysisManagerDtaSplitPlugIn.clsAnalysisToolRunnerDtaSplit.SplitCattedDtaFileIntoSegments(System.String,System.Int32,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Split the dta txt file into multiple files
member.param: When True, then the split files will each have the same number of spectra; when false, then the split files will each have a similar number of bytes
member.returns: CloseOutType enum indicating success or failure

member.name: M:AnalysisManagerDtaSplitPlugIn.clsAnalysisToolRunnerDtaSplit.CreateNextSegment(System.IO.StreamWriter@,System.Int32@)
member.summary: Closes the current segment and then creates the next one

member.name: M:AnalysisManagerDtaSplitPlugIn.clsAnalysisToolRunnerDtaSplit.CountSpectraInCattedDtaFile(System.String)
member.summary: Counts the number of spectra in the input concatenated DTA file (_dta.txt file)
member.returns: The number of spectra found (i.e. the number of header lines found); returns 0 if any problems

member.name: M:AnalysisManagerDtaSplitPlugIn.clsAnalysisToolRunnerDtaSplit.LineEndCharacterCount(System.IO.FileInfo)
member.summary: This function reads the input file one byte at a time, looking for the first occurence of Chr(10) or Chr(13) (aka vbCR or VBLF) When found, the next byte is examined If the next byte is also Chr(10) or Chr(13), then the line terminator is assumed to be 2 bytes; if not found, then it is assumed to be one byte
member.returns: 1 if a one-byte line terminator; 2 if a two-byte line terminator
